short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Randomise a list of attendees and show on a JIRA scrum board to determine standup order.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension lets you randomise a list of attendees on a JIRA scrum board to determine standup order.

Use the Next (‚è©) button to highlight the next person to talk. You can hide team members who are away that day. Every day it will automatically reshuffle the list for you and unhide previously hidden team members.

Optionally sync the attendees with others in your team in real time, including whose turn it is, without needing to refresh your page.
